channel.title: D3.js on Just another data blog
channel.description: Recent content in D3.js on Just another data blog

item.title: Mapping my Facebook Messenger Network
item.description: I am currently going through my personal data downloaded from Facebook to better understand my digital footprint and what Facebook knows about me. The Messenger data is an amazing source for text analysis, for instance topic modeling, but besides the meta data, there is also a wealth of metadata, in particular members of my group chats and conversations. I used network analysis to explore my activity on Messenger, the connections between my friends and answer questions like: did I do a good job at connecting my friends?
